name: Alex Kidd in the ghettos
description:
Play as the legendary sega icon Alex Kidd and beat some bozos on the court in this massive downgrade from the previous Alex Kidd titles. Challenge the all mighty prophet Goku or Team up with John Cena to challenge the WWE tag team champions and not that much more in Alex Kidd in the ghettos.

known issues

  1. The win counter doesn't display the first win on the UI but is counted 
  2. Some characters don't have the correct icon
  3. ragdolls are buggy
  4. text in the Goku battle is displayed the wrong way
